verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, destroy \w not|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* an inscription \w of|strong="H1732"\w* It title, when Saul sent \w and|strong="H1732"\w* watched \w his|strong="H1732"\w* house \w to|strong="H1732"\w* kill \w him|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H8199"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* enemies, O \w my|strong="H1696"\w* God; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w defend|strong="H8199"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* rise \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

Deliver \w me|strong="H3820"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* save \w me|strong="H3820"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* bloody men.

\w For|strong="H7358"\w* behold \w they|strong="H1696"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* caught \w my|strong="H1696"\w* soul: \w the|strong="H1696"\w* mighty \w have|strong="H7563"\w* rushed \w in|strong="H1696"\w* upon \w me|strong="H1696"\w*:

Neither \w is|strong="H2534"\w* \w it|strong="H3644"\w* \w my|strong="H2534"\w* iniquity, nor \w my|strong="H2534"\w* sin, \w O|strong="H0241"\w* Lord: without iniquity have I run, \w and|strong="H0241"\w* directed \w my|strong="H2534"\w* steps.

Rise up thou \w to|strong="H8085"\w* meet \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w*: \w even|strong="H3808"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* hosts, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Israel. Attend \w to|strong="H8085"\w* visit all \w the|strong="H0834"\w* nations: \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H8085"\w* all \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* work iniquity.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* return \w at|strong="H3068"\w* evening, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* suffer \w hunger|strong="H6310"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* dogs: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* go round about \w the|strong="H3068"\w* city.

Behold \w they|strong="H3988"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* speak \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H1869"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* sword \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H1869"\w* lips: \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w who|strong="H1980"\w*, say \w they|strong="H3988"\w*, hath heard \w us|strong="H1980"\w*?

But thou, O Lord, shalt laugh \w at|strong="H0802"\w* \w them|strong="H8121"\w*: thou shalt \w bring|strong="H1980"\w* all \w the|strong="H1980"\w* nations \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1077"\w*.
\w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w will|strong="H0995"\w* keep \w my|strong="H0995"\w* strength \w to|strong="H0995"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H0995"\w* thou art \w my|strong="H0995"\w* protector:
\w My|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mercy \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* prevent \w me|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w let|strong="H0389"\w* \w me|strong="H8199"\w* see \w over|strong="H8199"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* enemies: slay \w them|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w*, lest \w at|strong="H0430"\w* \w any|strong="H3426"\w* time \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H0120"\w* forget. Scatter \w them|strong="H0559"\w* \w by|strong="H0776"\w* thy power; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* bring \w them|strong="H0559"\w* \w down|strong="H8199"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w*, \w my|strong="H0559"\w* protector:
For the sin of their mouth, and the word of their lips: and let them be taken in their pride. And for their cursing and lying they shall be talked of,
When they are consumed: when they are consumed by thy wrath, and they shall be no more. And they shall know that God will rule Jacob, and all the ends of the earth.
They shall return at evening and shall suffer hunger like dogs: and shall go round about the city.
They shall be scattered abroad to eat, and shall murmur if they be not filled.
But I will sing thy strength: and will extol thy mercy in the morning. For thou art become my support, and my refuge, in the day of my trouble.
Unto thee, O my helper, will I sing, for thou art God my defence: my God my mercy.
